name: language-javascript
description: - This repository was created with the intention of facilitating the understanding of the javascript programming language. As an additional point, it is clarified that the repository will use freely available community content, specifically the RoadMap platform's javascript Study Guide, as a study guide to have a concept of the order in which things should be learned. not as teaching material but as an order to follow.

scripts.check: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint:check
scripts.fix: npm run prettier:fix && npm run lint:fix
